name: Crosswinds Aviation
about: Crosswinds Aviation is a premier flying school located in the Howell and Lansing, Michigan area, offering top-notch private pilot training. With a fleet of new aircraft, including the Diamond DA20 and Cessna 172, we provide a comprehensive flight training program that meets all FAA requirements. Our program includes a minimum of 40 hours of in-flight training, with an average of 55 hours, and covers cross-country flying, instrument flight, and night flight. We offer a Discovery Flight to introduce you to our training, and our online scheduling system allows for flexible flight lesson planning. Our highly-trained instructors and meticulous aircraft maintenance ensure a safe and professional learning environment. We also have a high school flight program that exposes students to the aviation industry and career opportunities. Whether you're a beginner or aspiring to be a professional pilot, Crosswinds Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
